title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Skills: Informal Coaching and Mentoring Strategies for Teacher Professional Development

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain at least three informal coaching scenarios that may arise in daily interactions with peer teachers.
Learners can design a structured informal mentoring framework to provide feedback to peers based on their own classroom experiences.
Learners can develop an action plan to utilize informal learning opportunities occurring in school environments (e.g., teacher workrooms, hallways) for instructional improvement.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
